executable.title: GeodesicActiveContour2D
executable.description: This is a CLI module that can be bundled in an extension
executable.acknowledgements: This work was partially funded by NIH grant NXNNXXNNNNNN-NNXN

double.name: sigma_min
double.label: SigmaMin
double.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

double.name: sigma_max
double.label: SigmaMax
double.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

double.name: propagation
double.label: PropagationScaling
double.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

double.name: curvature
double.label: CurvatureScaling
double.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

double.name: advection
double.label: AdvectionScaling
double.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

double.name: rms
double.label: MaximumRMS
double.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

integer.name: iterations
integer.label: Iterations
integer.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

double.name: alpha
double.label: Alpha
double.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

double.name: beta
double.label: Beta
double.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm

double.name: distance
double.label: InitialDistance
double.description: A double value (in units of mm) passed to the algorithm
